amendment.description: To require that any plan for compensation to individuals in military prisons in Iraq include provisions for compensation to former prisoners of war held by the regime of Saddam Hussein.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3307 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3307 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S6696, S6721; text: CR S6696) To require that any plan for compensation to individuals in military prisons in Iraq include provisions for compensation to former prisoners of war held by the regime of Saddam Hussein.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3307 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3307 proposed by Senator Reid.
